subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Marian Gaborik scored twice in 2 minutes 33 seconds in the third period, and Henrik Lundqvist and the Rangers held Alex Ovechkin without a point in a victory over the Capitols.
snippet: Marian Gaborik scored twice in 2 minutes 33 seconds in the third period, and Henrik Lundqvist and the Rangers held Alex Ovechkin without a point in a victory over the Capitols.
